notEnoughChars: You must enter at least @chars characters!
ariaNavigatedToSolution: Navigated to newly included sample solution after textarea.
ariaShowSolution: Show the solution. You will be provided with a sample solution.

taskDescription: The polymeric resin used for Merrifield solid-phase peptide synthesis (Section 26.8) is prepared by treating polystyrene with N-(hydroxymethyl)phthalimide and trifluoromethanesulfonic acid, followed by reaction with hydrazine. Propose a mechanism for both steps.
